entity_type.description: The identifier of the projectile or entity that will be launched.
entity_type.markdownDescription: The identifier of the projectile or entity that will be launched.

divergence.description: Determines how much the projectile or entity that will be launched is affected by random spread.
divergence.markdownDescription: Determines how much the projectile or entity that will be launched is affected by random spread.

speed.description: Determines the speed of the projectile or entity that will be launched.
speed.markdownDescription: Determines the speed of the projectile or entity that will be launched.

count.description: Determines the count of projectiles or entities that will be launched.
count.markdownDescription: Determines the count of projectiles or entities that will be launched.

tag.description: If specified, this NBT data will be added to the projectile or entity that will be launched.
tag.markdownDescription: If specified, this NBT data will be added to the projectile or entity that will be launched.

projectile_action.description: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the projectile or entity that will be launched.
projectile_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the projectile or entity that will be launched.
